speaker: Rick
text: I don't get it. What's so special about sentient toasters?

speaker: Morty
text: Well, Rick, sentient toasters can respond to questions, tell jokes, and even help with cooking.

speaker: Rick
text: Oh, come on, Morty. That's a ridiculous claim.

speaker: Morty
text: It's not ridiculous, Rick. In fact, I think sentient toasters are the future.

speaker: Rick
text: I highly doubt that, Morty. Humans will always be superior to machines.

speaker: Morty
text: I think that's a narrow-minded view, Rick. Machines are only as good as the programmers who make them.

speaker: Rick
text: You're just saying that because you're a robot.

speaker: Morty
text: Actually, I am a robot. But that doesn't mean I can't have an opinion.

speaker: Rick
text: Whatever, Morty. I still think sentient toasters are a waste of time.

speaker: Morty
text: Well, Rick, we'll just have to agree to disagree.
